title: The men abandoned the male control of the newborns, broken by the side effects?
subtitle: A preliminary study of a hormonal form of birth control for men has been discontinued due to the often reported side effects of women who organize the birth, which has led many to notice that double standards appear to exist.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Men left a pioneering study on male birth control due to side effects such as mood change, muscle pain, and birth love.
